aspect: 1. Filipe Luis wants to stay at Chelsea until the end of his contract.
2. Atletico Madrid are considering re-signing him.
3. Luis played for Brazil during the international break.
4. Chelsea are focused on the Premier League title run-in.
5. Mourinho is demanding focus from the team.
6. Chelsea have nine difficult games to play.
7. Luis is prepared to cope with the hard situation.
explain: Filipe Luis desires to remain at Chelsea for the duration of his contract, regardless of any struggles or difficulties he may have at the club.

Atletico Madrid, the club Filipe Luis originally played for before joining Chelsea, is considering bringing him back to the team due to him struggling to secure a starting spot at Chelsea and performing well in recent matches for Brazil's national team.

Filipe Luis's recent success and representation of the Brazilian national team during the recent international break highlights his ability and potential to be a valuable player for Chelsea. This could make him a more competitive option for the starting left-back position.

The given aspect highlights that Chelsea is currently involved in the battle for winning the Premier League title. With only a few matches left to play in the season, the team is focused on securing as many points as possible to secure the top spot in the league table. As such, the team's priority is likely to be on league performance rather than other distractions, including individual player contracts and future roster moves.

The given aspect states that Jose Mourinho, the manager of Chelsea, is demanding complete focus from the team. This means that he expects all the players to be completely dedicated towards their football and give their best at all times. Mourinho is known for his high demands and his ability to get the best out of his players. So, it is likely that he will expect nothing less than complete focus from the team in order to achieve success.
Chelsea have nine difficult games left to play in the season.

The given aspect states that Filipe Luis is prepared to cope with the hard situation. This suggests that the full back understands that the current situation at Chelsea might not be easy, but he is willing to face the challenges and work through them. Despite facing some difficulties in securing a permanent spot in the team, Luis has continued to train hard and compete for a spot on the pitch. This shows resilience and determination, which are important qualities for overcoming hardships.
